properties.name: ajp.enabled
properties.description: Enables AJP for Apache port forwarding

properties.name: ajp.port
properties.description: This is the port to connection with Apache HTTP

properties.name: learning.epochs
properties.description: The number of epoch revolutions to try in Deep Learning Fit

properties.name: learning.pics-per-row
properties.description: The number of pictures to write per row

properties.name: learning.response-timeout
properties.description: The number of seconds before timing out for a response

properties.name: learning.testing-file
properties.description: File name to save testing images

properties.name: learning.training-file
properties.description: File name to save training images

properties.name: messaging.local-url
properties.description: The URL used for local connections. All listeners connect to this URL. Senders will connect to this URL if local-host = true
